name: places/ChIJoXXNwf1bwokRPNv9mn0sZ8M
formattedAddress: 429 E 82nd St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 429 E 82nd St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
Taz was great! The experience I had with him was five-star from beginning to end. I saw him on Instagram and texted him, and he responded within minutes.

My girlfriend's robe for her Halloween costume was HUGE. He came in on his off day -- took it in and shortened the sleeves/length in just a couple of hours! The space he's in is perfectly curated and he offered us refreshments as well.

Amazing service, great energy, and top-tier tailoring services. We'll be back to do all of her suits now and will be recommending you along the way. 5/5! Thank you Taz and welcome to Detroit!!!

originalText.text: I bought a suit secondhand from a consignment shop. The pants needed a lot of tailoring, and the jacket needed to be shortened a bit. Taz was great, and he was able to do it all. He was very professional and had great rates. He was so nice, and he made me a Taz-branded headband made from some of the jacket scraps, too.  I highly recommend him to anyone in the area needing a tailor!

text.text: I bought a suit secondhand from a consignment shop. The pants needed a lot of tailoring, and the jacket needed to be shortened a bit. Taz was great, and he was able to do it all. He was very professional and had great rates. He was so nice, and he made me a Taz-branded headband made from some of the jacket scraps, too.  I highly recommend him to anyone in the area needing a tailor!

originalText.text: Taz has creative talent that can help you customize your own wants and needs. I believe that he could create something out of recycled materials like vintage bed sheets, vintage clothes and so on.  If you want to attend an event with a unique set of clothes or even just going to the mall and events, I would highly recommend Taz. I also love what he did to the store! It also was an experience exploring his store. Would definitely come back☺️

originalText.text: My son just moved to NewYork and needed pants tailored  for a wedding he was in. I search Tailors on Google and found Taz.  I called Taz and he fit my son in for a fitting right away and got the pants tailored quickly.  Taz did an excellent job and was very easy to work with.  His price is very reasonable and his hours of doing business are great.  I even got a text from him asking how the pants fit for the wedding.  I would highly recommend Taz if you are in need for a Tailor.   We will continue to do business with him in the future! Thanks Taz -you are awesome.

originalText.text: Taz is an amazing and experienced tailor! He did a wonderful  job hemming my bridesmaid's dress. He even steamed it so it's ready to wear!! It was easy to communicate with him and he works super quickly. Definitely worth the money and the commute (which was my case).
